Package server.unipr.it

Class ServerServiceMember

java.lang.Object
server.unipr.it.ServerServiceMember
public class ServerServiceMember extends Object
The ServerServiceMember class contains all method that a member needs to use to get access to database. For example here there's a method that user user to store his information into the database when he sign in, contains a method that user needs to excract all payment that he has to make.
Author:
Spagni Alex Zuelli Arianna

  • Method Details

    • signUpMembers

      public int signUpMembers(RequestSignMember rq)
      This method is used to check if username and password insert from the user are correct or not.
      Parameters:
      rq - an object that contains username and password to check.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=Username and password correct.
      2)negative=Username and password not correct.

    • signInMembers

      public int signInMembers(RequestSignMember rq)
      This method is used to store username,password,fiscal code and address of a new user.
      Parameters:
      rq - an object that contains username,password,address and fiscal code.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=All data stored correctly.
      2)negative=Data not stored.

    • addABoat

      public int addABoat(RequestBoatMember rq)
      This method is used to store a new boat.
      Parameters:
      rq - object that contains lenght, id of the boat, id of member who wants to add a boat and name of the boat.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=New boat stored correctly.
      2)negative=New boat not stored.

    • getBoat

      public ArrayList<javaClass.Boat> getBoat(int idMember, ArrayList<javaClass.Boat> boatArrayList, int typeReq)
      This method is used to fetch all boat related a specific user.
      Parameters:
      idMember - id of the Member who boats we want to extract.
      boatArrayList - list where we will go to add all boat extracted.
      typeReq - an integer value that distinguish which request client has sent to the server.
      Returns:
      It return an array list with all boats fetched.

    • removeABoat

      public int removeABoat(int idBoat)
      This method is used to remove a specific boat from the database.
      Parameters:
      idBoat - id of the boat we want to remove.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=Boat removed.
      2)negative=Boat not removed.

      Parameters:
      idMember - id of the Member, we want to extract notification.
      notificationsArrayList - list where we are going to add all notification extracted.
      Returns:
      It return an array list of that contains all notification extracted.

      Returns:

      2)negative=Notification not removed.

    • insertRaceFee

      public int insertRaceFee(RequestPaymentFeeMember rq)
      This method is used to add a race fee into the database.This fee will be related to a user.
      Parameters:
      rq - contains all data about the fee that we are going to store.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=Fee added.
      2)negative=Fee not added.

    • payFeeMember

      public int payFeeMember(int id, int typeReq, int paymentType)
      This method is used from a member to pay membership or storage fee.
      Parameters:
      id - this is the id of the fee that a member wants to pay
      typeReq - an integer value that distinguish which request client has sent to the server.
      paymentType - a string value that say which payment method a member used.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=Fee paied.
      2)negative=Fee not paied.

    • addFeeToBonifico

      public void addFeeToBonifico(int id, int typeReq)
      This method is used to add the fee paied by the user (Membership,Storage or Race) to bonifico table in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the fee paied.
      typeReq - an integer value that distinguish which request client has sent to the server.

    • addFeeToCreditCard

      public void addFeeToCreditCard(int id, int typeReq)
      This method is used to add the fee paied by the user (Membership,Storage or Race) to creditCard table in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the fee paied.
      typeReq - an integer value that distinguish which request client has sent to the server.

    • getRace

      public ArrayList<javaClass.Race> getRace(int idMember, ArrayList<javaClass.Race> raceArrayList, int typeReq)
      This method is used to fetch race from the database. Different races will be drawn based on the type of request.
      Parameters:
      idMember - id of the member we want to drawn races.
      raceArrayList - list where we are going to add race that we drawn from the database.
      typeReq - an integer value that distinguish which request client has sent to the server.
      Returns:
      It return an array that contain all the race drawn from the database.

    • joinARace

      public int joinARace(int idMember, int idBoat, int idRace)
      This method is used to add a user to a race.
      Parameters:
      idMember - id that identify the member who wants to join the race.
      idBoat - id of the boat a member will use for that race.
      idRace - id of the race, member wants to join.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=member added to the race.
      2)negative=member not added to the race.
